name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro
details: The latest iPhone with A17 Bionic chip, 48MP camera, and ProMotion display.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
details: A powerful Android smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, 200MP camera, and S-Pen support.

name: MacBook Air M2
details: Ultra-thin MacBook with M2 chip, Liquid Retina display, and all-day battery life.

name: Dell XPS 15
details: High-performance laptop with Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, and 4K OLED display.

name: DJI Mini 3 Pro Drone
details: A compact drone with 4K HDR video, obstacle avoidance, and 34-minute flight time.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
details: Premium noise-canceling wireless headphones with LDAC and 30-hour battery life.

name: Samsung 55" QLED Smart TV
details: 4K UHD QLED Smart TV with Quantum HDR, 120Hz refresh rate, and voice control.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
details: Advanced smartwatch with Always-On Retina display, ECG, and fitness tracking.

name: Canon EOS R5 Camera
details: Professional mirrorless camera with 8K video recording and Dual Pixel AF.

name: Logitech MX Master 3 Mouse
details: Ergonomic wireless mouse with precision scroll wheel and USB-C charging.
